So if that reasoning had anything to it, why didn't
that pave the way to peace first?
jpnChrName: ──そんなモンで平和が手に入るなら あの再事変も成功してたんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
──そんなモンで平和が手に入るなら
あの再事変も成功してたんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: Don't compare my most noble research to that product of mere coincidence! My—
engSearchText:
Don't compare my most noble research to that
product of mere coincidence! My—
jpnChrName: 偶然生まれたガラクタと一緒にするな！ 私が目指すのはより崇高にして──
jpnSearchText:
偶然生まれたガラクタと一緒にするな！
私が目指すのはより崇高にして──

engChrName: Please stop, Professor. We've heard enough.
engSearchText: Please stop, Professor. We've heard enough.
jpnChrName: 先生──もう止めてください。
jpnSearchText: 先生──もう止めてください。

engChrName: There are lines no researcher or engineer should cross.
engSearchText: There are lines no researcher or engineer should cross.
jpnChrName: ──研究者や技術者にも 超えてはならない一線がある。
jpnSearchText:
──研究者や技術者にも
超えてはならない一線がある。

engChrName: Human experimentation, biological weapons, brainwashing and mind control, gene editing...
engSearchText:
Human experimentation, biological weapons,
brainwashing and mind control, gene editing...
jpnChrName: 人体実験、生物兵器、精神操作や洗脳、 ヒト遺伝子の操作──
jpnSearchText:
人体実験、生物兵器、精神操作や洗脳、
ヒト遺伝子の操作──

engChrName: Manipulating the atomic structure of matter through fusion reactions risks creating energy beyond our control.
engSearchText:
Manipulating the atomic structure of matter through
fusion reactions risks creating energy beyond
our control.
jpnChrName: 物質の原子構成を反応・融合で操作するのも 制御不能な熱量を世界にもたらしかねない……
jpnSearchText:
物質の原子構成を反応・融合で操作するのも
制御不能な熱量を世界にもたらしかねない……

engChrName: We already have a stable energy source in the form of orbal energy. There's no need to dabble with something so risky.
engSearchText:
We already have a stable energy source in the form of
orbal energy. There's no need to dabble with
something so risky.
jpnChrName: 安定的な導力技術が確立した以上“禁忌”と すると理科大学の倫理会議でも決定し……
jpnSearchText:
安定的な導力技術が確立した以上“禁忌”と
すると理科大学の倫理会議でも決定し……

engChrName: That was why the institute decided to ban researching it—and other colleagues and workshops abroad followed suit.
engSearchText:
That was why the institute decided to ban researching
it—and other colleagues and workshops abroad
followed suit.
jpnChrName: 他国の大学や、技術工房もそれに続いた……
jpnSearchText: 他国の大学や、技術工房もそれに続いた……

engChrName: How could you do this when you were the one who taught me all of that?!
engSearchText:
How could you do this when you were the one who
taught me all of that?!
jpnChrName: ──そう講義してくれたのは貴方でしょう！？
jpnSearchText: ──そう講義してくれたのは貴方でしょう！？

engChrName: I... Well...
engSearchText: I... Well...
jpnSearchText: ……それは………

engChrName: All pretty words, but a desire to taste the forbidden fruit is what makes us human, is it not?
engSearchText:
All pretty words, but a desire to taste the forbidden
fruit is what makes us human, is it not?
jpnChrName: ──ま、とはいっても 可能なら手を出すのがヒトの性じゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
──ま、とはいっても
可能なら手を出すのがヒトの性じゃないの？

engChrName: The magicians of the Dark Ages didn't let taboos get in THEIR way.
engSearchText:
The magicians of the Dark Ages didn't let taboos get
in THEIR way.
jpnChrName: 暗黒時代の魔導技術とか 何でもアリだったみたいじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
暗黒時代の魔導技術とか
何でもアリだったみたいじゃない？

engChrName: Going back further, you even have events like the Great Collapse painting how wild the times were.
engSearchText:
Going back further, you even have events like the
Great Collapse painting how wild the times were.
jpnChrName: 古代に至っては文明一つが消し飛ぶような 《大崩壊》ってのも起きた……
jpnSearchText:
古代に至っては文明一つが消し飛ぶような
《大崩壊》ってのも起きた……

engChrName: Tell me: is it fun forcing your own sense of morality upon everyone else?
engSearchText:
Tell me: is it fun forcing your own sense of morality
upon everyone else?
jpnChrName: 綺麗事言ってんじゃないよって話だよねぇ？
jpnSearchText: 綺麗事言ってんじゃないよって話だよねぇ？

engChrName: You're twisting my words.
engSearchText: You're twisting my words.
jpnSearchText: 違う……！！

engChrName: It's true that science and engineering are about learning to understand the laws that govern this world.
engSearchText:
It's true that science and engineering are about
learning to understand the laws that govern
this world.
jpnChrName: 女神が司る世界の森羅万象──確かに それを解き明かすのが学問と技術の使命だ！
jpnSearchText:
女神が司る世界の森羅万象──確かに
それを解き明かすのが学問と技術の使命だ！

engChrName: But our goal is to do that as the humans we are at our core!
engSearchText:
But our goal is to do that as the humans we are at
our core!
jpnChrName: でもそれは僕たち自身── 人間の“実存”を通して行われるものだ！
jpnSearchText:
でもそれは僕たち自身──
人間の“実存”を通して行われるものだ！

engChrName: We don't achieve anything by casting aside our humanity—the relationships we've made, the society we've built...
engSearchText:
We don't achieve anything by casting aside our
humanity—the relationships we've made, the society
we've built...
jpnChrName: そして人を人たらしめているのは 社会であり、他者との関係そのもの──
jpnSearchText:
そして人を人たらしめているのは
社会であり、他者との関係そのもの──

engChrName: If we do that, then the entire foundation that inspires our search crumbles!
engSearchText:
If we do that, then the entire foundation that inspires
our search crumbles!
jpnChrName: その部分が揺らいでしまったら “前提”がそもそも崩壊してしまう……！
jpnSearchText:
その部分が揺らいでしまったら
“前提”がそもそも崩壊してしまう……！

engChrName: That's why we have to draw a line in the sand.
engSearchText: That's why we have to draw a line in the sand.
jpnChrName: ──だったらやっぱり “守るべき一線”はあるはずでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
──だったらやっぱり
“守るべき一線”はあるはずでしょう！？

engChrName: It's the only thing standing between the noble ambitions of those in our field—and the heinous abyss that awaits those who cross it.
engSearchText:
It's the only thing standing between the noble
ambitions of those in our field—and the heinous
abyss that awaits those who cross it.
jpnChrName: 僕たち学者や研究者、技術者が 人間性を手放す“深淵”に堕ちないためにも！
jpnSearchText:
僕たち学者や研究者、技術者が
人間性を手放す“深淵”に堕ちないためにも！

engChrName: Those were Professor Hamilton's...
engSearchText: Those were Professor Hamilton's...
jpnChrName: っ……ハミルトン博士の……
jpnSearchText: っ……ハミルトン博士の……

engChrName: What idiocy! Your reasoning is as naïve as hers!
engSearchText: What idiocy! Your reasoning is as naïve as hers!
jpnChrName: ええい、師弟揃って どこまでも青臭い理想論を……！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、師弟揃って
どこまでも青臭い理想論を……！

engChrName: If you really think so little of Quatre, why did you call him?
engSearchText:
If you really think so little of Quatre, why did you
call him?
jpnChrName: ──だったらどうして カトル君に連絡したんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
──だったらどうして
カトル君に連絡したんですか……？
……！？

engChrName: I'm so sorry... I screwed up...
engSearchText: I'm so sorry... I screwed up...
jpnChrName: ……すまない……… どうやらしくじってしまったようだ……
jpnSearchText:
……すまない………
どうやらしくじってしまったようだ……

engChrName: Please, stop this... Th-They want my—
engSearchText: Please, stop this... Th-They want my—
jpnChrName: ……どうか、止めてくれ…… あいつらは、私の──
jpnSearchText:
……どうか、止めてくれ……
あいつらは、私の──

engChrName: Aaaaargh!
engSearchText: Aaaaargh!
jpnChrName: うわああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText: うわああああっ……！！

engChrName: Just before becoming an AI, you were filled with regret, weren't you?
engSearchText:
Just before becoming an AI, you were filled with
regret, weren't you?
jpnChrName: そんな風になる直前の貴方は 悔いていたんじゃないんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
そんな風になる直前の貴方は
悔いていたんじゃないんですか……？

engChrName: You wished you'd never gotten involved with the mafia and been compelled to cross a line no human should.
engSearchText:
You wished you'd never gotten involved with the
mafia and been compelled to cross a line no
human should.
jpnChrName: マフィアを受け入れ、取り憑かれたように 悪魔の領域に踏み入ってしまったことを。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアを受け入れ、取り憑かれたように
悪魔の領域に踏み入ってしまったことを。

engChrName: After so much mental anguish, you regained your senses and realized just how far you'd gone...
engSearchText:
After so much mental anguish, you regained your
senses and realized just how far you'd gone...
jpnChrName: だけど迷いと懊悩の果てに それでも本当の自分を取り戻して……
jpnSearchText:
だけど迷いと懊悩の果てに
それでも本当の自分を取り戻して……

engChrName: You tried to fight back against them, didn't you?
engSearchText: You tried to fight back against them, didn't you?
jpnChrName: 最後の最後でマフィアに 抗おうとしたんじゃないんですか？
jpnSearchText:
最後の最後でマフィアに
抗おうとしたんじゃないんですか？

engChrName: What nonsense is... I would never...
engSearchText: What nonsense is... I would never...
jpnChrName: なにを……馬鹿な……
jpnSearchText: なにを……馬鹿な……

engChrName: That call does make a lot more sense when viewed in that light.
engSearchText:
That call does make a lot more sense when viewed in
that light.
jpnChrName: ま、そう考えると確かに あの言葉の辻褄は合ってくるな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そう考えると確かに
あの言葉の辻褄は合ってくるな。

engChrName: But there was no resisting this, and the conversion went ahead anyway—leavin' only an empty vessel behind.
engSearchText:
But there was no resisting this, and the conversion
went ahead anyway—leavin' only an empty
vessel behind.
jpnChrName: ──だが抵抗空しく“変換”は行われ、 用済みになった肉体だけが取り残された。
jpnSearchText:
──だが抵抗空しく“変換”は行われ、
用済みになった肉体だけが取り残された。

engChrName: I ain't got a clue if you even remember your last words after what happened to you...
engSearchText:
I ain't got a clue if you even remember your last words
after what happened to you...
jpnChrName: 最後の言葉を“今のアンタ”が 覚えてるかどうかは分からないが……
jpnSearchText:
最後の言葉を“今のアンタ”が
覚えてるかどうかは分からないが……

engChrName: ...but if you're a recreation of the real Professor Callaghan, surely you can at least understand them?
engSearchText:
...but if you're a recreation of the real Professor
Callaghan, surely you can at least understand them?
jpnChrName: たとえ再現された存在だとしても “理解”は出来るんじゃないですか？
jpnSearchText:
たとえ再現された存在だとしても
“理解”は出来るんじゃないですか？

engChrName: I can't imagine someone so beloved by many—who even rivaled Professor Hamilton—couldn't.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine someone so beloved by many—who
even rivaled Professor Hamilton—couldn't.
jpnChrName: あのハミルトン博士のライバルにして いまだ大勢に慕われてるアンタだったら。
jpnSearchText:
あのハミルトン博士のライバルにして
いまだ大勢に慕われてるアンタだったら。

engChrName: Van... Agnès...
engSearchText: Van... Agnès...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、アニエスさんも……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、アニエスさんも……
………………………………

engChrName: ...Are you done? This is getting rather tedious.
engSearchText: ...Are you done? This is getting rather tedious.
jpnChrName: ──で、つまらない話は終わりかい？
jpnSearchText: ──で、つまらない話は終わりかい？

engChrName: Congrats on spouting baseless speculation to the last word—all without a shred of hard evidence to back it up.
engSearchText:
Congrats on spouting baseless speculation to the last
word—all without a shred of hard evidence to back
it up.
jpnChrName: 妄想じみたご高説をありがとう。 憶測ばかりで退屈だったけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
妄想じみたご高説をありがとう。
憶測ばかりで退屈だったけどねぇ。

engChrName: It's going to take a lot more than that to sway someone who cast aside the very shackles of mortality.
engSearchText:
It's going to take a lot more than that to sway
someone who cast aside the very shackles
of mortality.
jpnChrName: ま、高次元の存在へと昇華した貴方が 今の話で絆されるとも思わないけど……
jpnSearchText:
ま、高次元の存在へと昇華した貴方が
今の話で絆されるとも思わないけど……

engChrName: Though it's no skin off my back if you decide to just throw up your hands and give up now.
engSearchText:
Though it's no skin off my back if you decide to just
throw up your hands and give up now.
jpnChrName: こちらとしては、貴方が今更全てを ひっくり返したとしても構わないよ……？
jpnSearchText:
こちらとしては、貴方が今更全てを
ひっくり返したとしても構わないよ……？

engChrName: If you no longer care about the government casting you aside, or getting revenge on that impertinent Professor Cronkite.
engSearchText:
If you no longer care about the government casting
you aside, or getting revenge on that impertinent
Professor Cronkite.
jpnChrName: ──貴方をお払い箱にした政府と 生意気なクロンカイト教授への意趣返し。
jpnSearchText:
──貴方をお払い箱にした政府と
生意気なクロンカイト教授への意趣返し。

engChrName: Or achieving the ultimate honor of surpassing the likes of Latoya Hamilton—of Claude Epstein, even.
engSearchText:
Or achieving the ultimate honor of surpassing the
likes of Latoya Hamilton—of Claude Epstein, even.
jpnChrName: Ｌ・ハミルトン、いやＣ・エプスタインすら 超えられるかもしれない最高の栄誉。
jpnSearchText:
Ｌ・ハミルトン、いやＣ・エプスタインすら
超えられるかもしれない最高の栄誉。

engChrName: If you're set on forgetting it all, of rendering all your effort, sacrifice, and humiliation for NOTHING, I won't stop you. ❤
engSearchText:
If you're set on forgetting it all, of rendering all your
effort, sacrifice, and humiliation for NOTHING, I
won't stop you. ❤
jpnChrName: 努力と執念、踏みにじってきた助手たち、 貴方自身の犠牲も全部無駄になっちゃうけどね❤
jpnSearchText:
努力と執念、踏みにじってきた助手たち、
貴方自身の犠牲も全部無駄になっちゃうけどね❤

engChrName: ...Y-You must be joking, Melchior.
engSearchText: ...Y-You must be joking, Melchior.
jpnChrName: ッ……メルキオル君。 冗談でもやめてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ッ……メルキオル君。
冗談でもやめてくれたまえ。

engChrName: My resolve will never falter—not when the answer I have dreamed of for so long is close at hand.
engSearchText:
My resolve will never falter—not when the answer I
have dreamed of for so long is close at hand.
jpnChrName: 私の決意は揺るがないとも── 夢にまで見た“答え”が目の前にあるのだから！
jpnSearchText:
私の決意は揺るがないとも──
夢にまで見た“答え”が目の前にあるのだから！

engChrName: No, I would damn myself before I ever thought to back down. I will NOT let all I've suffered be for naught!
engSearchText:
No, I would damn myself before I ever thought to
back down. I will NOT let all I've suffered be
for naught!
jpnChrName: ……ああそうだ、引き下がってたまるものか…… 引き換えにした全てを無駄にしないためにも！
jpnSearchText:
……ああそうだ、引き下がってたまるものか……
引き換えにした全てを無駄にしないためにも！

engChrName: Professor...!
engSearchText: Professor...!
jpnSearchText: っ……先生……！

engChrName: We almost got through to him...
engSearchText: We almost got through to him...
jpnChrName: ……そんな……
jpnSearchText: ……そんな……

engChrName: That's fine. Just means we're doing this the hard way.
engSearchText: That's fine. Just means we're doing this the hard way.
jpnChrName: ハッ……だったら “力ずく”しかなさそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……だったら
“力ずく”しかなさそうだな？

engChrName: At the very least, we need to get that evil imp out of his ear.
engSearchText:
At the very least, we need to get that evil imp out of
his ear.
jpnChrName: はい──少なくとも悪意を囁く 邪霊（インプ）は祓うべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい──少なくとも悪意を囁く
邪霊（インプ）は祓うべきでしょう。

engChrName: Yeah. Then we might finally be able to have a proper talk with the guy.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Then we might finally be able to have a proper
talk with the guy.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうすりゃもう少し、 冷静に話ができるってモンだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そうすりゃもう少し、
冷静に話ができるってモンだろう。

engChrName: You're surprisingly cocky for a group that struggled BEFORE you were a man down.
engSearchText:
You're surprisingly cocky for a group that struggled
BEFORE you were a man down.
jpnChrName: あはは、昨日より一人少ないのに なかなか余裕があるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、昨日より一人少ないのに
なかなか余裕があるじゃないか。

engChrName: Think I'll break out the big guns. I wouldn't want to disappoint.
engSearchText:
Think I'll break out the big guns. I wouldn't want
to disappoint.
jpnChrName: だったら──こちらとしても 更に期待に応えなくっちゃねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
だったら──こちらとしても
更に期待に応えなくっちゃねぇ？

engChrName: Then I will release my first limiter as well.
engSearchText: Then I will release my first limiter as well.
jpnChrName: こちらも“第一制限”を解除します。
jpnSearchText: こちらも“第一制限”を解除します。

engChrName: Ishtanti, engage Dominatus Mode.
engSearchText: Ishtanti, engage Dominatus Mode.
jpnChrName: ──イシュタンティ、 モード《暴君（ドミナトゥス）》。
jpnSearchText:
──イシュタンティ、
モード《暴君（ドミナトゥス）》。

engChrName: It doubled its wings from two to four!
engSearchText: It doubled its wings from two to four!
jpnChrName: 翼の数、２から４に変動……！
jpnSearchText: 翼の数、２から４に変動……！

engChrName: Sure bodes well for us!
engSearchText: Sure bodes well for us!
jpnChrName: ハッ、ヤベエなあれは……！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ヤベエなあれは……！

engChrName: Well, we ain't turnin' back now! Time to settle the score!
engSearchText:
Well, we ain't turnin' back now! Time to settle
the score!
jpnChrName: だがやるしかねぇ── 落とし前を付けさせてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
だがやるしかねぇ──
落とし前を付けさせてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Right! For Risette, too!
engSearchText: Right! For Risette, too!
jpnChrName: はい……！ リゼットさんの分まで！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
リゼットさんの分まで！

engChrName: With me, FIO! XEROS! We're going to put a stop to all this!
engSearchText:
With me, FIO! XEROS! We're going to put a stop
to all this!
jpnChrName: 行こう、ＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ！ 絶対に止めるんだ──僕たちの手で！
jpnSearchText:
行こう、ＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ！
絶対に止めるんだ──僕たちの手で！

engChrName: Understood, Quatre!
engSearchText: Understood, Quatre!
jpnChrName: ＯＫ、カトル！
jpnSearchText: ＯＫ、カトル！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！！
ッ……
っ……！？

engChrName: We did it!
engSearchText: We did it!
jpnChrName: やった……！
jpnSearchText: やった……！

engChrName: Hah! How's that, ya psycho?!
engSearchText: Hah! How's that, ya psycho?!
jpnChrName: ハッ、どうだサイコ野郎！！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、どうだサイコ野郎！！

engChrName: Mmgh... Oh, you'll pay dearly for that!
engSearchText: Mmgh... Oh, you'll pay dearly for that!
jpnChrName: ッ…… やってくれるじゃないかぁ……！
jpnSearchText:
ッ……
やってくれるじゃないかぁ……！

engChrName: They are more synchronized this time. We must respond in kind.
engSearchText:
They are more synchronized this time. We must
respond in kind.
jpnChrName: ……昨日以上の連携。 ならばこちらも──
jpnSearchText:
……昨日以上の連携。
ならばこちらも──

engChrName: (Now's my chance to—)
engSearchText: (Now's my chance to—)
jpnChrName: （今のうちに端末を……！）
jpnSearchText: （今のうちに端末を……！）

engChrName: What...?
engSearchText: What...?
jpnSearchText: え──

engChrName: ...Shit!

life—was just rendered meaningless?
jpnChrName: ……貴方の人生が、研究が。 たった今台無しになっちゃった気分はさ。
jpnSearchText:
……貴方の人生が、研究が。
たった今台無しになっちゃった気分はさ。

engChrName: Huh...?
engSearchText: Huh...?
jpnSearchText: ………え…………

engChrName: You tried so, so hard, even throwing away your humanity, but an incomplete work is nothing but worthless garbage.
engSearchText:
You tried so, so hard, even throwing away your
humanity, but an incomplete work is nothing but
worthless garbage.
jpnChrName: 頑張って頑張って、外道にも堕ちたけれど、 完成しなけりゃ結局はただのゴミだよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
頑張って頑張って、外道にも堕ちたけれど、
完成しなけりゃ結局はただのゴミだよねぇ。

engChrName: So, how does it feel? Tell me, tell me, tell me!
engSearchText: So, how does it feel? Tell me, tell me, tell me!
jpnChrName: ねえどんな気持ち？　ねえねえねえ？
jpnSearchText: ねえどんな気持ち？　ねえねえねえ？

engChrName: It's too bad. He would've been much harder to break, but maybe I should've turned my charms on Professor Cronkite instead. ❤
engSearchText:
It's too bad. He would've been much harder to break,
but maybe I should've turned my charms on Professor
Cronkite instead. ❤
jpnChrName: あーあ、これなら無理してでも クロンカイト教授を誑かせば良かったなぁ❤
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、これなら無理してでも
クロンカイト教授を誑かせば良かったなぁ❤

engChrName: Ahh... Ahh... Ahh...
engSearchText: Ahh... Ahh... Ahh...
jpnChrName: ──っ……あ、あああ、ああああああ……
jpnSearchText: ──っ……あ、あああ、ああああああ……

engChrName: AHHHHHHHH!
engSearchText: AHHHHHHHH!
jpnChrName: あああああああああああああああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText: あああああああああああああああああっ……！！
っ……

engChrName: How? How can someone be so evil?
engSearchText: How? How can someone be so evil?
jpnChrName: ……なんて、なんて酷い……
jpnSearchText: ……なんて、なんて酷い……
……………………………

engChrName: You have wasted enough time mocking him, Melchior.
engSearchText:
You have wasted enough time mocking
him, Melchior.
jpnChrName: メルキオル、嬲るのはそのくらいに。
jpnSearchText: メルキオル、嬲るのはそのくらいに。

engChrName: The police and bracers are almost here. It is about time we left.
engSearchText:
The police and bracers are almost here. It is about
time we left.
jpnChrName: 警官隊に遊撃士が接近しています。 これ以上の長居は無用でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
警官隊に遊撃士が接近しています。
これ以上の長居は無用でしょう。

engChrName: Oh, true. I suppose we should.
engSearchText: Oh, true. I suppose we should.
jpnChrName: おっと、そりゃ大変だ。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そりゃ大変だ。

engChrName: Targets sighted!
engSearchText: Targets sighted!
jpnChrName: 目標発見……！
jpnSearchText: 目標発見……！

engChrName: What the...? Just what happened here?!
engSearchText: What the...? Just what happened here?!
jpnChrName: この状況…… どうなってるんだ……！？
jpnSearchText:
この状況……
どうなってるんだ……！？

engChrName: Au revoir! We will be taking our leave now.
engSearchText: Au revoir! We will be taking our leave now.
jpnChrName: オ・ルヴォワール（さようなら）── 僕らはこれで失礼するよ。
jpnSearchText:
オ・ルヴォワール（さようなら）──
僕らはこれで失礼するよ。

engChrName: But we will have our revenge for all the time you've made us waste here.
engSearchText:
But we will have our revenge for all the time you've
made us waste here.
jpnChrName: 無駄足を踏ませてくれた借りは いずれ返させてもらうからね。
jpnSearchText:
無駄足を踏ませてくれた借りは
いずれ返させてもらうからね。

engChrName: October 25th, 4:25PM
engSearchText: October 25th, 4:25PM

engChrName: It's no good! I can't stop the system from falling apart!
engSearchText:
It's no good! I can't stop the system from
falling apart!
jpnChrName: ……駄目だ……！ システムの自己崩壊を止められない……！
jpnSearchText:
……駄目だ……！
システムの自己崩壊を止められない……！

engChrName: I can't reconnect it to the orbal net or another energy source, either. Supporting such an advanced AI is just too heavy a burden...
engSearchText:
I can't reconnect it to the orbal net or another energy
source, either. Supporting such an advanced AI is just
too heavy a burden...
jpnChrName: 導力ネットや供給網への再接続も不可能…… ここまで高性能なＡＩを維持するのは、もう……
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットや供給網への再接続も不可能……
ここまで高性能なＡＩを維持するのは、もう……

engChrName: B-But that means he'll...
engSearchText: B-But that means he'll...
jpnChrName: そ、それじゃあこのまま……
jpnSearchText: そ、それじゃあこのまま……

engChrName: *sigh*
engSearchText: *sigh*
jpnSearchText: ……ハン………
………………………………

engChrName: I'm so sorry... The Genesis isn't reacting to anything anymore...
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry... The Genesis isn't reacting to
anything anymore...
jpnChrName: すみません……ゲネシスも もう反応しないみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
すみません……ゲネシスも
もう反応しないみたいで……

engChrName: It's not your fault, Agnès! There must be a way—I'm just not seeing it!
engSearchText:
It's not your fault, Agnès! There must be a way—I'm
just not seeing it!
jpnChrName: アニエスさんのせいじゃない！ 僕が何とかっ……何か方法が……！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんのせいじゃない！
僕が何とかっ……何か方法が……！

engChrName: It's fine, Salision... I'm just paying the price for my foolishness.
engSearchText:
It's fine, Salision... I'm just paying the price for
my foolishness.
jpnChrName: もういい……サリシオン君…… ……私が愚かだったのだ……
jpnSearchText:
もういい……サリシオン君……
……私が愚かだったのだ……

engChrName: I crossed the line that should never be crossed and tried to realize a weapon of pure evil.
engSearchText:
I crossed the line that should never be crossed and
tried to realize a weapon of pure evil.
jpnChrName: 研究者としての一線を踏み越え…… 悪魔の兵器を現実にしようとした……
jpnSearchText:
研究者としての一線を踏み越え……
悪魔の兵器を現実にしようとした……

engChrName: I allowed myself to be led astray. I have no one to blame but myself.
engSearchText:
I allowed myself to be led astray. I have no one to
blame but myself.
jpnChrName: 誑かされた、などは言い訳だな…… ……全ては私の意志で、因果応報だろう……
jpnSearchText:
誑かされた、などは言い訳だな……
……全ては私の意志で、因果応報だろう……

engChrName: But... But... Professor!
engSearchText: But... But... Professor!
jpnChrName: でも……でも、キャラハン先生っ……！
jpnSearchText: でも……でも、キャラハン先生っ……！

engChrName: I am moved by how much you care for me even after all I've done...
engSearchText:
I am moved by how much you care for me even after
all I've done...
jpnChrName: まだ私を先生などと呼ぶのかね……
jpnSearchText: まだ私を先生などと呼ぶのかね……

engChrName: Perhaps you are the right person to entrust with this task after all.
engSearchText:
Perhaps you are the right person to entrust with this
task after all.
jpnChrName: いや、そんな君だからこそ…… ……託すのはありかもしれないな……
jpnSearchText:
いや、そんな君だからこそ……
……託すのはありかもしれないな……

engChrName: ...What task?
engSearchText: ...What task?
jpnSearchText: え……？

engChrName: At this rate, I will have failed as a researcher and died for nothing at all.
engSearchText:
At this rate, I will have failed as a researcher and died
for nothing at all.
jpnChrName: ……このままでは私は 研究者としても無駄死にだ……
jpnSearchText:
……このままでは私は
研究者としても無駄死にだ……

engChrName: So, please...don't let this all have been in vain.
engSearchText: So, please...don't let this all have been in vain.
jpnChrName: だからせめて、サリシオン君…… どうか今回のことを役立ててもらえまいか。
jpnSearchText:
だからせめて、サリシオン君……
どうか今回のことを役立ててもらえまいか。

engChrName: I may have failed to perfect the formula needed for fusion, but I discovered many others in the process.
engSearchText:
I may have failed to perfect the formula needed for
fusion, but I discovered many others in the process.
jpnChrName: 『反応融合式』こそ完成しなかったが── 解析中に幾つか“副産物”を発見してね……
jpnSearchText:
『反応融合式』こそ完成しなかったが──
解析中に幾つか“副産物”を発見してね……

engChrName: ...! All these formulae...
engSearchText: ...! All these formulae...
jpnChrName: ！　この数式データは……
jpnSearchText: ！　この数式データは……

engChrName: I believe them to be as-of-yet undiscovered formulae with peacetime applications.
engSearchText:
I believe them to be as-of-yet undiscovered formulae
with peacetime applications.
jpnChrName: 恐らく平和利用できる類の 未発見の数式だ……
jpnSearchText:
恐らく平和利用できる類の
未発見の数式だ……

engChrName: Analyze this terminal after I am gone, and you may be able to secure them.
engSearchText:
Analyze this terminal after I am gone, and you may
be able to secure them.
jpnChrName: 私が消えた後…… この端末を解析すればあるいは……
jpnSearchText:
私が消えた後……
この端末を解析すればあるいは……

engChrName: ...But, Professor, that...
engSearchText: ...But, Professor, that...
jpnSearchText:
…………ぁ……………
……でも先生……それは………

engChrName: It's not gonna be easy to make use of finds from a technological singularity.
engSearchText:
It's not gonna be easy to make use of finds from a
technological singularity.
jpnChrName: 技術的特異点の副産物…… ……簡単には行かねぇだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
技術的特異点の副産物……
……簡単には行かねぇだろうな。

engChrName: That's putting it lightly... We're talking technology humanity wouldn't have reached on its own for decades.
engSearchText:
That's putting it lightly... We're talking technology
humanity wouldn't have reached on its own
for decades.
jpnChrName: ええ……人類が何十年もかかって 辿り着くような領域の代物でしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……人類が何十年もかかって
辿り着くような領域の代物でしょうから。

engChrName: We'll need more than one genius around to make sense of it all.
engSearchText:
We'll need more than one genius around to make
sense of it all.
jpnChrName: それこそ“天才”が 数人レベルで集まらない限りは……
jpnSearchText:
それこそ“天才”が
数人レベルで集まらない限りは……

engChrName: I feared as much... Cronkite likely won't be able to manage the task alone...
engSearchText:
I feared as much... Cronkite likely won't be able to
manage the task alone...
jpnChrName: ……やはり、無理か…… 恐らくクロンカイト君ですら一人では……
jpnSearchText:
……やはり、無理か……
恐らくクロンカイト君ですら一人では……

engChrName: If only there were one or two more like him around... If only she were here...
engSearchText:
If only there were one or two more like him around...
If only she were here...
jpnChrName: せめてもう一人か二人…… ……それこそ“彼女”がいてくれれば……
jpnSearchText:
せめてもう一人か二人……
……それこそ“彼女”がいてくれれば……

engChrName: I wish I could tell you not to underestimate me, but I, too, know my limits.
engSearchText:
I wish I could tell you not to underestimate me, but I,
too, know my limits.
jpnChrName: 見くびらないで頂きたい── と言いたいですが確かに無理ですね。
jpnSearchText:
見くびらないで頂きたい──
と言いたいですが確かに無理ですね。

engChrName: You're...
engSearchText: You're...
jpnChrName: アンタは……
jpnSearchText: アンタは……

engChrName: Y-Yang?!
engSearchText: Y-Yang?!
jpnChrName: ヤ、ヤン兄……！？
jpnSearchText: ヤ、ヤン兄……！？

engChrName: Cronkite...I have...
engSearchText: Cronkite...I have...
jpnChrName: ……クロンカイト君……私は……
jpnSearchText: ……クロンカイト君……私は……

engChrName: I will refrain from commenting on all that transpired here.
engSearchText:
I will refrain from commenting on all that
transpired here.
jpnChrName: 今回の顛末についてのコメントは 差し控えておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
今回の顛末についてのコメントは
差し控えておきましょう。

engChrName: To we researchers, all that matters are results. However...
engSearchText:
To we researchers, all that matters are results.
However...
jpnChrName: 研究者は“成果”が全て──とはいえ。
jpnSearchText: 研究者は“成果”が全て──とはいえ。

engChrName: ...you were able to catch a glimpse of something we all—at the very least—feel a small yearning for. That does have meaning.
engSearchText:
...you were able to catch a glimpse of something we
all—at the very least—feel a small yearning for.
That does have meaning.
jpnChrName: 誰しもが憧れなくもない境地を 垣間見られたのは何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
誰しもが憧れなくもない境地を
垣間見られたのは何よりです。

engChrName: ...! Yes... I suppose you're right.
engSearchText: ...! Yes... I suppose you're right.
jpnChrName: ！　……ああ、そうだな……
jpnSearchText: ！　……ああ、そうだな……

engChrName: My time here is at an end. I leave the rest to you and the many promising youths around us.
engSearchText:
My time here is at an end. I leave the rest to you and
the many promising youths around us.
jpnChrName: 私はここで退場する── 後のことは君や、後進たちに託そう。
jpnSearchText:
私はここで退場する──
後のことは君や、後進たちに託そう。

engChrName: May you forever remain on the forefront of Calvard's—no—the world's—
engSearchText:
May you forever remain on the forefront of
Calvard's—no—the world's—
jpnChrName: これからもカルバードの、 いや世界の先端を駆け続けて──
jpnSearchText:
これからもカルバードの、
いや世界の先端を駆け続けて──

engChrName: I will follow my own path, wherever it may lead me.
engSearchText: I will follow my own path, wherever it may lead me.
jpnChrName: 私は私の道を行くに過ぎません。
jpnSearchText: 私は私の道を行くに過ぎません。

engChrName: Though I do intend to make some use of the formulae you leave us.
engSearchText:
Though I do intend to make some use of the
formulae you leave us.
jpnChrName: ──ただし貴方の発見した数式は 多少は役立たせてもらうつもりですが。
jpnSearchText:
──ただし貴方の発見した数式は
多少は役立たせてもらうつもりですが。

engChrName: As do I. We won't let your work be in vain.
engSearchText: As do I. We won't let your work be in vain.
jpnChrName: ええ── 私たちが決して無駄にはしません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
私たちが決して無駄にはしません。
……………………………

engChrName: What...?
engSearchText: What...?
jpnSearchText: ……え………

engChrName: Who's that?
engSearchText: Who's that?
jpnChrName: あの人は……
jpnSearchText: あの人は……

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnSearchText: ………あ…………！

engChrName: The professor is back!
engSearchText: The professor is back!
jpnChrName: ハカセ、戻ッテキタ……！
jpnSearchText: ハカセ、戻ッテキタ……！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: I'm home, FIO. XEROS.
engSearchText: I'm home, FIO. XEROS.
jpnChrName: ただいまＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ。
jpnSearchText: ただいまＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ。

engChrName: I'm sorry for being away for so long, Quatre.
engSearchText: I'm sorry for being away for so long, Quatre.
jpnChrName: それから──カトル。 遅くなってしまったわね。
jpnSearchText:
それから──カトル。
遅くなってしまったわね。

engChrName: Gran!
engSearchText: Gran!
jpnChrName: グランマ（おばあちゃん）っ……！
jpnSearchText: グランマ（おばあちゃん）っ……！

engChrName: If it isn't Professor Latoya Hamilton, one of Epstein's three disciples...
engSearchText:
If it isn't Professor Latoya Hamilton, one of Epstein's
three disciples...
jpnChrName: （三高弟の一人、   ラトーヤ・ハミルトン博士……）
jpnSearchText:
（三高弟の一人、
ラトーヤ・ハミルトン博士……）

engChrName: In the flesh. I've never had the honor of seeing her in person before this.
engSearchText:
In the flesh. I've never had the honor of seeing her in
person before this.
jpnChrName: （ふふ……   私も直接会うのは初めてね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ……
私も直接会うのは初めてね。）

engChrName: I-I'm so glad we made it in time...
engSearchText: I-I'm so glad we made it in time...
jpnChrName: な、何とか 間に合ったみたいですけど～……
jpnSearchText:
な、何とか
間に合ったみたいですけど～……

engChrName: Oh, Callaghan... You damn fool.
engSearchText: Oh, Callaghan... You damn fool.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン、この馬鹿野郎が。
jpnSearchText: ……キャラハン、この馬鹿野郎が。

engChrName: Esmeray... Giscard...
engSearchText: Esmeray... Giscard...
jpnChrName: エスメレー君にジスカール親方……
jpnSearchText: エスメレー君にジスカール親方……

engChrName: And Professor Hamilton...I didn't know you were back.
engSearchText:
And Professor Hamilton...I didn't know you
were back.
jpnChrName: ……そして……ハミルトン博士…… ……戻っていらっしゃったのだな……
jpnSearchText:
……そして……ハミルトン博士……
……戻っていらっしゃったのだな……

engChrName: I hurried back to Calvard as soon as I learned what was transpiring.
engSearchText:
I hurried back to Calvard as soon as I learned what
was transpiring.
jpnChrName: ええ、人伝に今回の事を聞いて 急遽帰国させてもらいました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、人伝に今回の事を聞いて
急遽帰国させてもらいました。

engChrName: It saddens me deeply to have to bid farewell to a fellow researcher and associate like this.
engSearchText:
It saddens me deeply to have to bid farewell to a
fellow researcher and associate like this.
jpnChrName: ……貴方とは切磋琢磨し合った仲、 こんな形で別れるのは残念でなりません。
jpnSearchText:
……貴方とは切磋琢磨し合った仲、
こんな形で別れるのは残念でなりません。

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnSearchText: ハハ…………

engChrName: As someone who admired and sought to surpass you, those words mean more to me than you could ever know.
engSearchText:
As someone who admired and sought to surpass you,
those words mean more to me than you could
ever know.
jpnChrName: ……その言葉だけで報われるというものだ。 貴女に憧れ……超えようとした身には……
jpnSearchText:
……その言葉だけで報われるというものだ。
貴女に憧れ……超えようとした身には……

engChrName: Rest assured that we will use what you have left us.
engSearchText: Rest assured that we will use what you have left us.
jpnChrName: ……どうか、後のことは任せてください。
jpnSearchText: ……どうか、後のことは任せてください。

engChrName: Cronkite and I will see those formulae analyzed.
engSearchText: Cronkite and I will see those formulae analyzed.
jpnChrName: 数式については私とクロンカイトが 何としても解析してみせます。
jpnSearchText:
数式については私とクロンカイトが
何としても解析してみせます。

engChrName: We will all see to it—Esmeray, Quatre, your other assistants, and the artisans of Basel as well.
engSearchText:
We will all see to it—Esmeray, Quatre, your other
assistants, and the artisans of Basel as well.
jpnChrName: 勿論エスメレーやカトル、 貴方の助手たちや職人街の皆さん……
jpnSearchText:
勿論エスメレーやカトル、
貴方の助手たちや職人街の皆さん……

engChrName: You did so much to further the city's development and held it so dear. Now we will use our strength to nurture yours.
engSearchText:
You did so much to further the city's development
and held it so dear. Now we will use our strength to
nurture yours.
jpnChrName: 貴方が愛し──育んできた バーゼル全ての力を借りてでも。
jpnSearchText:
貴方が愛し──育んできた
バーゼル全ての力を借りてでも。
あ……

engChrName: I'd like to believe that ZCF can help in some way, too.
engSearchText:
I'd like to believe that ZCF can help in some
way, too.
jpnChrName: ……及ばずながら ＺＣＦや財団も協力できると思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
……及ばずながら
ＺＣＦや財団も協力できると思うわ。

engChrName: I see now... This is what I should have done all along...
engSearchText:
I see now... This is what I should have done
all along...
jpnChrName: …………そうか…… ……私も、そうすればよかったのか……
jpnSearchText:
…………そうか……
……私も、そうすればよかったのか……

engChrName: I feel like in my last moments, I have solved the most difficult formula of all.
engSearchText:
I feel like in my last moments, I have solved the most
difficult formula of all.
jpnChrName: 最後の最後で…… 最も難解な数式が解けた気分ですよ……
jpnSearchText:
最後の最後で……
最も難解な数式が解けた気分ですよ……

engChrName: Thank you, Professor. Thank you, Salision.
engSearchText: Thank you, Professor. Thank you, Salision.
jpnChrName: ありがとう博士…… ……ありがとうサリシオン君たち……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう博士……
……ありがとうサリシオン君たち……

engChrName: And thank you to all who stand with them.
engSearchText: And thank you to all who stand with them.
jpnChrName: 解決屋の諸君に、リベールのお嬢さんも……
jpnSearchText: 解決屋の諸君に、リベールのお嬢さんも……

engChrName: Now...I leave with no regrets...
engSearchText: Now...I leave with no regrets...
jpnChrName: ……これで……思い残すことはない………
jpnSearchText: ……これで……思い残すことはない………

engChrName: Farewell, Professor Callaghan...
engSearchText: Farewell, Professor Callaghan...
jpnChrName: さようなら、キャラハン先生……
jpnSearchText: さようなら、キャラハン先生……

engChrName: May you find peace with Aidios above.
engSearchText: May you find peace with Aidios above.
jpnChrName: ……どうか女神の下で安らかに。
jpnSearchText: ……どうか女神の下で安らかに。

engChrName: It's no use. It's locked.
engSearchText: It's no use. It's locked.
jpnChrName: ……ダメだ、鍵がかかってる。
jpnSearchText: ……ダメだ、鍵がかかってる。

engChrName: Well, we ain't got time to go back to look for the key. We'll have to find another way around.
engSearchText:
Well, we ain't got time to go back to look for the key.
We'll have to find another way around.
jpnChrName: 取りに戻る時間もねえだろ。 他のルートを探そうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
取りに戻る時間もねえだろ。
他のルートを探そうぜ。
